summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 19
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Thursday, with 10 gaining and the other 9 declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.7% to $21,099 by market close.
